rules_text: If {W} was spent to cast this spell, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card, then discard a card. If {B} was spent to cast this spell, return up to one creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If {R} was spent to cast this spell, it deals 1 damage to any target. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one creature.
